name: Stuffed Asian Carp
author: DesertMama
summary: This baked whole Asian carp stuffed with mushrooms is a very affordable dish. It is delicious, simple, quick, and very easy to cook. Serve with lemon slices.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons bread crumbs, or as needed
½ cup salted butter, cut into bits
directions: Clean fish well, rinse, and pat dry with paper towels
Place fish in a shallow bowl and pour vinegar over top
Turn fish to coat and let sit for 20 minutes
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Drain and discard vinegar from the fish
Brush fish inside and outside with lemon juice and transfer to the prepared baking dish
Combine 1/2 cup bread crumbs, onions, mushrooms, carrot, and garlic in a bowl; mix in water
Stuff fish with bread crumb mixture
Score the top and brush all over with beaten egg
Cover thickly with remaining bread crumbs and butter
Bake in the preheated oven, basting occasionally, for 1 hour
